mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into user (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, TYPE) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into user
USER_ID,
USER_NAME,
PASSWORD,
NAME,
EMAIL,
PHONE,
BIRTHDAY,
SEX,
TYPE,

mapper.update:
update user
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
